com.davidsoergel.stats

Class KernelDensityFunctionSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidsoergel.stats.KernelDensityFunctionSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Function<Double,Double>, Serializable

    public class KernelDensityFunctionSampler
extends Object
implements Serializable, com.google.common.base.Function<Double,Double>
    Given a scatterplot and an x value, sample from the distribution of Y values in a column of a given width above the given x.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Soergel
